definition: house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)

sentences.english: It has a nice restaurant, a bar anda laundry etc.
sentences.chinese: 它有一個不錯的餐廳，一個酒吧，以及洗衣房等。

sentences.english: Community laundry, pool and rec room .
sentences.chinese: 社區洗衣房，游泳池和娛樂室。

sentences.english: The day before the trail, Mr. Dawson sent his best suit to the laundry.
sentences.chinese: 審判前一天，道森先生將他最好的西服送到洗衣房。

sentences.english: Something no laundry ever does, except this one.
sentences.chinese: 哪家洗衣房都沒這麼幹過，除了我這兒。

sentences.english: Investigate reported faults for laundry and kitchen equipment.
sentences.chinese: 調查洗衣房和廚房設備的報損。

sentences.english: Cathy and I escaped from the washhouse to have a ramble at liberty.
sentences.chinese: 凱帝和我從洗衣房溜出來想自由自在地溜達溜達。

sentences.english: Floor tiles to kitchen, bathroom, WC, En-suite and laundry.
sentences.chinese: 廚房，浴室，衛生間，洗衣房均選用高質量瓷磚地板。

sentences.english: The other thing the clients were hoping for was an upstairs laundry.
sentences.chinese: 戶主的另外一個要求就是樓上要有一個洗衣房。

sentences.english: Do the laundry and get on with your duties.
sentences.chinese: 把這些衣服拿到洗衣房做你的事情。

sentences.english: The dormitory has tolling washing machines and refrigerators, microwave ovens for public use on the first floor .
sentences.chinese: 北校區留學生宿舍一樓設有公用廚房和洗衣房。

sentences.english: Sucre walks through the laundry room and pauses.
sentences.chinese: Sucre走過洗衣房，停住了腳步。

sentences.english: Many facilities enclose tumblers separately from the rest of the laundry.
sentences.chinese: 許多設施都把烘乾機與洗衣房裏的其它設備分開放置。

sentences.english: The requisition form will be directly handed to the Laundry attendant and countersigned.
sentences.chinese: 申請表將直接傳遞給洗衣房服務員和副署。

sentences.english: The next three balcony suite son, describing laundries in here.
sentences.chinese: 此套房子上下三個陽臺，竟將洗衣房設於此處。

sentences.english: After a few minutes, the laundry room door opened, and a man walked in.
sentences.chinese: 過了幾分鐘，洗衣房的門開了，一個男人走了進來。

sentences.english: Responsible for hotel linen washing and management.
sentences.chinese: 全面負責洗衣房和布草房的運作和管理。
